title: (x) Alternative Airlines logo – Frutiger {Geoff}
content:
Im sure these are fairly obvious typefaces, but I cant put my finger on them. Sorry about the size of the image. Thanks in advance.

author: lumo

comments.content: It could be Frutiger Ultra Black with Bold/Black but I can't be sure because of the small sample.
I've gone with Frutiger Black at 80% height (ouch), this will do for now, thanks.
